related_text: BOND ORDINANCE PROVIDING FOR REPAIRS TO THE SEWER PUMP, BY AND IN THE BOROUGH OF AVON -BY- THE -SEA, IN THE COUNTY OF MONMOUTH, STATE OF NEW JERSEY ; APPROPRIATING $17,500 THEREFOR AND AUTHORIZING THE ISSUANCE OF $16,500 BONDS OR NOTES OF THE BOROUGH TO FINANCE PART OF THE COST THEREOF.
Resolution No. 222-2023 - Authorizing the Purchase of Main Street Lamppost
Resolution No. 223-2023 – Authorizing Seventh/Final  Payment to Shorelands Construction Inc. for Barrier Free Access Project for Avon Public Library

Resolution No. 225-2023 – Authorizing the Purchase of Holiday Lights

The Board of Commissioners of the Borough of Avon -by-the-Sea hereby approves the purchase of holiday lights for Main Street from Christmas Designers.com in an amount not to exceed $8,236.50 from account C-01-041-203.

Resolution No. 226-2023 – Authorizing the Purchase of Beach Playground Equipment with Grant Funding

The Board of Commissioners of the Borough of Avon -by-the-Sea hereby approves the purchase of Beach Playground Equipment (Custom PowerScape 5-12 Unit) and Installation (by a Certified GameTime Installer) from MRC, Inc. from accounts G-04-121-201 and C-02-047-201 in an amount not to exceed $93,131.81.

Resolution No. 227-2023 – Authorizing the Mayor to Sign an Agreement with Pumping Services, Inc. for a Sewer Pump Repair at Ocean and Lincoln Avenues in an amount not to exceed $17,500.00 out of account 3-03- -101-201.
